hadiths.text: Narrated Nu'aym: Ma'iz came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and admitted (having committed adultery) four times in his presence so he ordered him to be stoned to death, but said to Huzzal: If you had covered him with your garment, it would have been better for you

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّتْرِ عَلَى أَهْلِ الْحُدُودِ
chapter.eng-name: Concealing those who have committed deeds for which had punishments are prescribed
